Text: Is this the original or director's cut? I have never seen the original.
i hope its the originial. the directors cut sucks. but we will never know if sgntpepper wont seed it ;)

and here's yet another blade runner release without any information at all.. frustrating. (and the Director's Cut was meant for people who could think for themselves, and dont need everything spoon-fed to them by a stupid voice-over.)
